# Brazil

## Overview

Brazil is the largest country in South America and Latin America. It is the fifth-largest country in the world by both area and population.

## Key Facts

- **Capital**: Brasilia
- **Official Language**: Portuguese
- **Currency**: Brazilian Real
- **Government**: Federal presidential republic
- **GDP**: $2.1 trillion (2023)

## Geography

Brazil contains most of the Amazon rainforest and the Amazon River. Its landscape includes tropical beaches, wetlands (Pantanal), savannas (Cerrado), and highlands.

## Economy

Brazil has Latin America's largest economy. Key sectors include agriculture (soybeans, coffee, beef), mining (iron ore), manufacturing, and services. It is rich in natural resources.
